Articles.Content:
Hey, guys. I was starting a new thread, and I had written a MASSIVE wall of text, when I hit ctrl-z instead of ctrl-c by accident, and lost the entire thing. I right clicked the text area and sure enough, Redo was enabled, but it didn't do anything!

Is that standard browser behaviour, or does the WYSIWYG editor influence it?

I'm really bummed by that. I was going to ask for some help, opinions and suggestions on something I will begin soon, and I totally lost the will to write it again.
I just tried this, and "redo" seemed to restore what I had written.
Oh, well. Maybe I'll do it later.
